description: Retention of single-storey rear/infill extension (in a modified form), involving lowering the ground floor level; alterations to front, side and rear elevations involving replacing single-glazed timber-framed windows with double-glazed timber-framed windows; alterations to the rear garden involving forming steps to sunken terrace and installing metal railings; and alterations to the forecourt involving the installation of a porch lantern and the tiling of the footpath and steps
decision_conditions: The modification to the rooflight of the extension shall be implemented as per the details on the approved plans. It shall be completed to the Council's satisfaction within 6 months of the date of this permission, otherwise the planning permission will lapse.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: 081 PA 01 Rev. A (Pre-existing site plan and front and west side elevation); 081 PA 02 Rev. A (Pre-existing ground floor plan and rear and east side elevations); 081 PA 03 (Pre-existing first and second floor plan); 081 PA 04 (Pre-existing loft plan); 081 PA 05 (Pre-existing section A-A); 081 PA 06 Rev. C (Approved site plan and front and west side elevations); 081 PA 06 Rev. E (Existing site plan and front and west side elevation); 081 PA 07 Rev. B (Approved ground floor plan and rear and east side elevation); 081 PA 07 Rev. D (Existing ground floor plan and rear and east side elevation); 081 PA 08 Rev. B (Approved first and second floor plans); 081 PA 08 Rev. D (Existing first and second floor plan); 081 PA 09 Rev. B (Approved section A-A); 081 PA 09 Rev. D (Existing section A-A); 081 PA 10 (Proposed site plan and front and west side elevations); 081 PA 11 Rev. B (Proposed ground floor plan and rear and east side elevation); 081 PA 12 (Proposed first and second floor plan); 081 PA 13 Rev. B (Proposed section A-A) (final revisions received 05.09.2021)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building on this site.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policy 7.B of the Development Management, Development Plan Document (2013); adopted Development (or Core) Strategy (April 2012); policy D4 of the London Plan (2021); and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
